v8:item.v8:content: This is a utility user intended for automation of some operations.
Utility users are created and modified automatically. They are not displayed in any user lists, including the lists where one can select users.
The following infobase user properties differ from the properties specified in the form: %1. Click "Save" to resolve the differences and hide this message.
Some of the infobase user properties are stored in the user card. The values stored in the card do not match the values specified here.
The infobase user is not found. Click "Save" to resolve the issue and hide this message.
Allow the user to log in using the specified authentication methods.
User is not assigned access rights (no role)
User does not have any startup rights (e.g. thin client or web client).
No rights to log in picture
User is not granted the minimum access rights to use the application.
It is recommended that you review the settings because the user was created by the user list owner (not by the administrator).
Make call or send text message
Demand password change on next login
Prevent the limited-access user from changing their password.

Authentication with the name assigned to the 1C:Enterprise user, which is sent to the authentication service over OpenID protocol. Only for a web server connection (the service address must be configured)

OpenID Connect enables the 1C:Enterprise system to verify a user's identity through third-party authentication. Users can log in to the 1C:Enterprise application with their account credentials from other websites that support OpenID Connect authentication, such as Google.
This authentication applies only to web server connections and requires the service address to be configured accordingly.

JWT token authentication (RFC 7519). This is a more advanced form of authentication than OpenID and OpenID Connect.
It is widely used by many public digital services.
Authentication with username and password of the operating system user associated with the 1C:Enterprise user.
Demand password change on next login
Fill-in the values from the infobase user properties.
Make call or send text message
Make call or send text message
